did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.unittitle: Cornell University. College of Architecture, Art, and Planning. Planning course telephone survey, 1971.

origination.label: Creator:
origination.corpname: Cornell University. College of Architecture, Art, and Planning.

did.repository: Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: News clippings, surveys, and other materials documenting a telephone survey of taxpayers in Ithaca, New York, done by Cornell University students in planning course 649, "Informal Study in Planning Practice," in cooperation with Ithaca Taxpayers Association.

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: News clippings, surveys, and other materials documenting a telephone survey of taxpayers in Ithaca, New York, done by Cornell University students in planning course 649, "Informal Study in Planning Practice," in cooperation with Ithaca Taxpayers Association.

prefercite.head: Cite As:
prefercite.p: Cornell University. College of Architecture, Art, and Planning. Planning course telephone survey, #15-5-1743. Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library.
